name: Mark Allen KUTNYAK, Appellant, v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Secretary of Corrections, Thomas Lavan, Superintendent, Mr. Flaherty, Records Supervisor, Richard Holmes, Unit Manager, and Joseph Semon, Counselor, Appellees

parties: Mark Allen KUTNYAK, Appellant, v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Secretary of Corrections, Thomas Lavan, Superintendent, Mr. Flaherty, Records Supervisor, Richard Holmes, Unit Manager, and Joseph Semon, Counselor, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of December, 2003, probable jurisdiction is noted and the' order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
840 A.2d 991
Mark Allen KUTNYAK, Appellant, v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Secretary of Corrections, Thomas Lavan, Superintendent, Mr. Flaherty, Records Supervisor, Richard Holmes, Unit Manager, and Joseph Semon, Counselor, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 3, 2003.
